p.k: Soul & Jazz LIVE! episode 1 includes Bill Laurance, Lindsey Webster, Terrace Martin, Avery.Sunshine, A/B Trio, Pocket Dragon, Resolution 88, Kathy Kosins, and YolanDa Brown.
p.d: From Grammy winners to those just starting out, Soul & Jazz LIVE! features artists from around the world performing original material captured as part of a live recorded studio session. Episode 1 includes Bill Laurance, Lindsey Webster, Terrace Martin, Avery.Sunshine, A/B Trio, Pocket Dragon, Resolution 88, Kathy Kosins, and YolanDa Brown. Produced by Spacerocket Media for SoulandJazz.com, this is the first in a six-part series featuring performances captured since late 2016.
